events.message: The client reported that their car was involved in a collision on the highway resulting in significant damage to the vehicle's front end.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords found in the initial report regarding vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the car accident case to ensure swift processing and support for the customer.
Acknowledgement of the claim filing sent to the customer, confirming receipt and providing details on the next steps in the process.
Customer was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and a detailed accident description to proceed.
The insured successfully submitted all requested documents including photos of the car, collision report, and witness statements.
Investigation into the circumstances of the accident began, with the claims adjuster reviewing submitted evidence and police findings.
The investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault in the collision; damage assessment report has been finalized.
A settlement amount covering repairs and rental car reimbursement has been proposed to the client for review and acceptance.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the quick handling of their car accident claim.
Approval of the claim was granted based on completed investigation and acceptance of the settlement offer by the customer.
Payment for vehicle repairs and associated costs was disbursed to the customerâ€™s designated bank account promptly.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following payment issuance and confirmation of repair completion.
All case files and documents related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and auditing.
